OOC: This is the third time I have sent this.

Rumble's jaw and gun dropped at the same time, as he stared on at a
robot exactly like him. He was nudged out of his astonishment by Frenzy
however. "Did, did you see that Frenzy?" Rumble asked pointing at the
goo.

"Heyyyy, what's going on here?" Rumble demanded.
